argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mat1bas.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | mat1bas.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | mat1bas.i | |- .1. = ( 1r ` ( N Mat R ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( N Mat R ) = ( N Mat R ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_matring | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( N Mat R ) e. Ring ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ N e. Fin ) -> ( N Mat R ) e. Ring ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` ( N Mat R ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 7 | #P_eqtri | |- B = ( Base ` ( N Mat R ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 3 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( ( N Mat R ) e. Ring -> .1. e. B ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ N e. Fin ) -> .1. e. B ) |
